task_summary: The robot pours the contents from a cup it holds into a mug placed below by means of a controlled tilt motion.

task_long_description.overview: A fixed robotic arm (SARA) is tasked with transferring liquid from a held cup into a mug on a workbench. The scene involves perception and alignment with the mug, positioning the cup above it, and executing a controlled pour. Visual confirmation and recovery strategies are incorporated to handle object detection failures.
preconditions: Robot gripper holds a cup containing liquid
A mug is present and accessible on the table
Work surface is clear in target area
stepwise_plan: Check visibility of the cup and mug; scan if not found
Detect precise positions of the cup and mug
Align with the cup and mug for pouring
Pour from the cup into the mug with a sufficient tilt
Retreat to a safe position afterward
success_criteria: Pouring action delivers contents into mug
failure_and_recovery: If cup/mug not visible, re-scan up to three times
If pour action fails, halt further motion and report
If collisions are detected, retreat immediately
task_long_description.termination: Tree terminates after retreating post-pour, regardless of cup emptiness.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

node_specs.description: Checks if the cup is visible for perception.
Scans the scene in a raster pattern to find the cup.
Performs perception to localize the cup.
Checks if the mug is visible for perception.
Scans the scene in a raster pattern to find the mug.
Performs perception to localize the mug.
Moves to a position above the cup in preparation for pouring.
Aligns the cup with the mug to ensure precise pouring.
Executes the pouring operation from cup to mug.
Safely retreats the arm after pouring.

recovery_strategy: Retry scanning for object up to 3 times
Stop and report on alignment/pour error
assumptions: The cup is the pouring source, as visually confirmed; mug is the target.
Objects are correctly specified from frames, not instruction text.
No explicit amount or pour_rate available in instruction or visual data.

expected_success_criteria: Cup contents transferred into mug, as visually observable post-pour
Robot arm clear of mug after retreat
